statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_message, feedback_id FROM feedback_notifications ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, feedback_rating FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_critical = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_critical = TRUE ORDER BY feedback_rating ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, feedback_rating AS rating FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC
SELECT feedback_rating, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_notifications GROUP BY feedback_rating HAVING total_feedback > 1 ORDER BY feedback_rating
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, CASE WHEN is_critical THEN 'Critical' ELSE 'Non-Critical' END AS severity FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_message LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, customer_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_threshold FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, customer_id, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE feedback_threshold > 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM notification_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_email FROM support_teams;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_email FROM support_teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 OR customer_id = 200;
SELECT criteria, trigger_action FROM notification_rules WHERE support_team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM support_teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY team_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, notification_type FROM support_team_notification ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_criteria WHERE threshold < 5;
SELECT feedback_id, triggered_at FROM feedback_notification_trigger ORDER BY triggered_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, criteria_name, threshold FROM feedback_criteria;

SELECT feedback.id, feedback.customer_id, feedback.rating, support_team_notification.notification_type FROM feedback JOIN feedback_notification_trigger ON feedback.id = feedback_notification_trigger.feedback_id JOIN support_team_notification ON feedback_notification_trigger.support_team_id = support_team_notification.support_team_id WHERE feedback.rating > 4 AND feedback_notification_trigger.triggered_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM support_team_notification WHERE notification_type LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT feedback.id, feedback.customer_id, feedback.rating, feedback_criteria.criteria_name FROM feedback JOIN feedback_criteria ON feedback.rating > feedback_criteria.threshold;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id, date_created FROM feedback;
SELECT team_name AS Team, team_email AS Email FROM support_team;
SELECT notification_text, recipient_email, date_sent FROM notification_log;
SELECT feedback_id, criteria_id, team_id FROM feedback_trigger;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, team_email FROM support_team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT notification_text, recipient_email FROM notification_log WHERE date_sent >= '2022-01-01' AND date_sent < '2022-03-01';

SELECT feedback_id, criteria_name, team_name FROM feedback_trigger JOIN notification_criteria ON feedback_trigger.criteria_id = notification_criteria.criteria_id JOIN support_team ON feedback_trigger.team_id = support_team.team_id WHERE feedback_trigger.feedback_id = 5;
